thread.title: Barclays’ European sales trading chief joins ITG
thread.title_full: Barclays’ European sales trading chief joins ITG

author: Financial News
title: Barclays’ European sales trading chief joins ITG
text:
Barclays’ European sales trading chief joins ITG By James Rundle 10 September 2015 The head of European sales trading at Barclays has left to take up the same role at agency broker ITG in Europe, which was left bruised earlier in the summer by a hefty fine in the US.
